name: Toasts With Egg and Bacon
recipeIngredient: 12 thin slices baguette, brushed with olive oil and toasted
3 hard-boiled eggs, preferably still warm, peeled and quartered
3 slices cooked bacon, broken into bite-size pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Spread a little mayonnaise in center of each toast. Place an egg quarter on top, cut side up. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Dab a little mayonnaise on center of each egg yolk and rest a piece of bacon on top. Sprinkle with chives and serve.
